sentence.Network_cn: 可以说1932年是该实验室最有收获的一年。

sentence.Network_en: He is arguably the best actor of his generation.
sentence.Network_cn: 按理他是他那一代中最优秀的演员。

companies arguably fired workers too aggressively this time , but they show little inclination to rehire , even though the recession has supposedly been over for five months now .但这次，公司可以说是过于急切地解雇了许多工人，而且似乎无意重新开始招聘人手，虽然到目前为止衰退按说已经结束五个多月了。

entry.tran: 可论证地;可以说;按理说
entry.def: You can use arguably when you are stating your opinion or belief, as a way of giving more authority to it.

example.ex: They are arguably the most important band since The Rolling Stones...
example.tran: 他们无疑是继滚石之后最出色的乐队。

example.tran: 可以说1932年是该实验室最有收获的一年。

Sentence.sentence: But schools rarely dig down to find out what really makes an applicant succeed, to create a class which also contains diversity of attitude and approach – arguably the only diversity that, in a business context, really matters.
The inconvenient fact about most books, to which Google has arguably paid insufficient attention, is that they are protected by copyright.
